name: Chocolate Cinnamon Roll Bread Machine Bread
author: JenCanCook
summary: This is a very flavorful bread that can be served for breakfast, lunch, snack, or dessert. This is fabulous with milk and can be topped with peanut butter, icing, or even used as French toast. I have a Kenmore® bread machine and used the Fruit/Nut setting.
ingredients: ¼ cup sucralose and brown sugar blend (such as Splenda® brown sugar blend)
½ cup peanut butter chips (such as Reese's®)
directions: Place water, milk, egg, vanilla extract, bread flour, sucralose and brown sugar blend, salt, cinnamon, cocoa powder, yeast, and margarine respectively in the pan of a bread machine
Select a 1 1/2-pound loaf cycle with a light crust and press Start
Add peanut butter chips and semisweet chips when the final knead cycle begins
Cool bread for 10 to 15 minutes before slicing
